summary: Resolved conflicts in weather.py and test_weather.py by removing redundant code check and preserving PR #204 intent to select a single random city
strategyUsed: Used origin/main's cleaner code structure (removing redundant 'if city:' check) while preserving HEAD's language about 'single random city' in test docstrings to maintain consistency with PR #204's purpose. Both implementations were functionally identical, so chose the more maintainable version.
